SubjectOrder â€” Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity GC-127 to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd., in respect of the proposed construction and operation of the NGTL Towerbirch Expansion Project
PrecisOrder directing the National Energy Board to issue a CERTIFICATE OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY GC-127 to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd.(NGTL) in order to authorize the construction and operation of the NGTL Towerbirch Expansion Project.
